errors.moreThanOneTitle__md: > File glob must contain only one `${title}`!
errors.noStarNextToTitle__md: > Star `*` can not be next to `${title}`!
errors.noAnyCharNextToTitle__md: > Any char `?` can not be next to `${title}`!
errors.noWindowsSlash__md: > Windows directory character `\` is not allowed! Use `/` instead.
errors.noGlobstarOnBothSides__md: > Globstar `**` can only be on one side of `${title}`!

errors.noBracedDirSetOrGlobstarOnBothSides__md: > A braced set, containing at least one slash `/` and a globstar `**` can only be on one side of `${title}`!
errors.noEmptyCharRange__md: > Character range can not be empty!
errors.noStarInPatternNextToTitle__md: > Star `*`, inside a pattern, can not be next to `${title}`!
errors.noAnyCharInPatternNextToTitle__md: > Any char `?`, inside a pattern, can not be next to `${title}`!

errors.noRegex__md: > File glob must contain `${regex}` where **regex** is your regular expression!

errors.noGlobstarOnBothSides__md: > Globstar `**` can only be on one side of `${regex}`!
errors.noBracedDirSetOnBothSides__md: > A braced set, containing at least one slash `/` can only be on one side of `${regex}`!
errors.noBracedDirSetOrGlobstarOnBothSides__md: > A braced set, containing at least one slash `/` and a globstar `**` can only be on one side of `${regex}`!
errors.noEmptyCharRange__md: > Character range can not be empty!

errors.noAnyCharInPatternNextToRegex__md: > Any char `?`, inside a pattern, can not be next to `${regex}`!
